plot: Rick, still in galactic prison, puts an intricate escape plan into action. Back on Earth, which is now under federation control, Morty and Summer have an argument about their grandpa.

After handing himself in, Rick Sanchez is interrogated for the invention of his portal gun. Meanwhile, on an Earth taken over by the Galactic Federation, Summer refuses to accept Rick's capture, and Morty attempts to convince her otherwise.—Zac Boomsma

Jerry is happy with the new Earth as ran by the Galactic Federation, while Summer feels the opposite. Rick gets back at the Galactic Federation while they try to obtain his technology on portals. The Council of Ricks get involved and Rick furthers the marital issues between Jerry and his daughter.—William DeVogel

Rick is being interrogated by the Galactic Federation in order to retrieve the formula to create a Portal Gun, when suddenly things get out of proportion. Meanwhile in Earth, Summer wants to rescue Rick at any cost, but Morty tries to persuade her that things are better without him.—GolpeNarval
